author: jzabroski
body:
# Support Question

Where to file bugs with Storage module?

Example: `Get-Disk` does not actually return all disks associated with an operating system. In particular, Amazon AWS EBS Volumes do not return, at least on `r5d` instances.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: You could use Windows Feedback tool and UserVoice site.

comments.author: jzabroski
comments.body: @iSazonov  I found the root cause and submitted a PR to improve the docs : https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/windows-powershell-docs/pull/990

title: Support Question: Where to file bugs with Storage module?
